title: Cisco Secure Client Overview
description: This dashboard provides centralized visibility into Cisco Secure Client (AnyConnect) logs.

definition.content:
[Cisco Secure Client](https://www.cisco.com/site/in/en/products/security/secure-client/index.html) (formerly AnyConnect) provides secure, encrypted VPN access for users connecting to internal resources. It ensures reliable remote connectivity, and handle sessions, licensing, and client version compatibility to maintain consistent security across multiple devices.

This dashboard provides centralized visibility into Cisco Secure Client (AnyConnect) logs.

For more information, see the [Cisco Secure Client Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cisco_secure_client/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Gives an overall view of VPN client activity and authentication behavior by summarizing total events, events over time, user activity, connection status, source IPs, and event details for quick visibility into endpoint behavior.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates the **Cisco Secure Client VPN** logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security/overview).

Datadog Monitors analyzes and correlates **VPN client and  connection status** events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Monitors](/monitors/triggered).
